x-x-x-.name: waltz
x-x-x-.text: Only recogniceable with an accent on the first beat.

x-x-x-x-.name: four on the floor
x-x-x-x-.text: When played in 4/4 on the bass drum.

x---x-x-x---.name: 3:2 polyrhythm
x---x-x-x---.text: A triplet over two notes results in this rhythm.

x--xx-x-xx--.name: 4:3 polyrhythm
x--xx-x-xx--.text: A quadruplet (quartole) over three notes results in this rhythm.

x-x-xx-x-x-x.name: Standard African Bell pattern
x-x-xx-x-x-x.text:
Usually written in 12/8.

Many many more bell patterns exist!

x--x--x---x--x--.name: bossa nova
x--x--x---x--x--.text: Like 2-3 son clave, the first part is |x--x--x-| tresillo.

x--x--x---x-x---.name: 3-2 son clave
x--x--x---x-x---.text: First part of it |x--x--x-| is also known as Tresillo.

x--xx--xx--xx--x.name: swing
x--xx--xx--xx--x.text:
two eights played with length 3-to-1.

There is a lot of room between shuffle |x-xx-xx-xx-x| and swing pattern.

x-x-xxx-xxxx-xx-.name: stadium clap
x-x-xxx-xxxx-xx-.text: Used in sports to cheer a team.
